AODCore.image



struct SheetContainer;
Contains information of an image

GLuint texture;


int width;


int height;


this(GLuint t, int w, int h);


this(string filename);


struct SheetRect;
A sheet container that will also contain location of obj inside a sheet, pixel-based coordinates where origin is {0, 0}. Useful for spritesheets, I'm sure there are some other utilities such as image cropping

Vector ul;


Vector lr;


this(ref SheetContainer sc, ref Vector ul_, ref Vector lr_);
Creates sheet rect

Params:
SheetContainer sc SheetContainer to use as image
Vector ul_ relative offset for the upper left coordinate from origin
Vector lr_ relative offset of the lower right coordinate from origin
